content.raw:
I'm in favor suppressing this warning if a user so chooses. 

And I understood the modular approach makes open-> open happen but I still think that the open -> open is incorrect code.

Just out of curiosity is there a place in the UI to activate suppress_mild_warnings? If not we should create a issue to make one

The changes should be up in a minute
